Name: JH - Address search
Output_template:
{"systemID":"556f28cda4af7","systemName":"DTF","query":"select CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',locality_name,', ',town_name) as display, uprn as name,
sao as flat, pao as house,street_name as street,town_name as town, post_town, county_name as county,postcode,uprn,lng,lat, locality_name as locality,ward,usrn
FROM warwickshire_dtf.llpgcache
WHERE 
((uprn ={uprn}) and ({postcode_search}='')) or ((
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like '%{#postcode_search}%')
)
AND length(REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))>5
) 

UNION 
select CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',locality_name,', ',town_name) as display, uprn as name,sao as flat,pao as house,street_name as street,town_name as town, post_town, county_name as county,postcode,uprn,lng,lat, locality_name as locality,ward,usrn
FROM northwarks_dtf.llpgcache

WHERE 
((uprn ={uprn}) and ({postcode_search}='')) or ((
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like '%{#postcode_search}%')
)
AND length(REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))>5
) 

UNION
select CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',locality_name,', ',town_name) as display, uprn as name,
sao as flat,pao as house,street_name as street,town_name as town, post_town,  county_name as county,postcode,uprn,lng,lat, locality_name as locality,ward,usrn
FROM nbbc_dtf.llpgcache

WHERE 
((uprn ={uprn}) and ({postcode_search}='')) or ((
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like '%{#postcode_search}%')
)
AND length(REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))>5
) 

UNION
select CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',locality_name,', ',town_name) as display, uprn as name,
sao as flat,pao as house,street_name as street,town_name as town, post_town, county_name as county,postcode,uprn,lng,lat, locality_name as locality,ward,usrn
FROM rbc_dtf.llpgcache

WHERE 
((uprn ={uprn}) and ({postcode_search}='')) or ((
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like '%{#postcode_search}%')
)
AND length(REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))>5
) 
UNION
select CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',locality_name,', ',town_name) as display, uprn as name,
sao as flat,pao as house,street_name as street,town_name as town, post_town, county_name as county,postcode,uprn,lng,lat, locality_name as locality,ward,usrn
FROM sdc_dtf.llpgcache

WHERE 
((uprn ={uprn}) and ({postcode_search}='')) or ((
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like '%{#postcode_search}%')
)
AND length(REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))>5
) 
ORDER BY street, house*1, house, flat ASC
LIMIT 750","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

Name: Validate Rent Account Signup_old
Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","systemID":"5a3ce148e4283","systemName":"MyAccount Rents (RBC)","query":"SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS 
(
    SELECT *
    	FROM 	rent_account_balances
    	inner join rent_account_customer_summary  on
    	  rent_account_balances.account_reference = rent_account_customer_summary.account_reference
    	WHERE 	rtrim(rent_account_balances.account_reference) 			= (rent_account_customer_summary.account_reference)
    	and		rtrim(rent_account_balances.sub)							= {SubAccount}
    	and		rtrim(rent_account_balances.check_no)						= {CheckDigit}
     	and 	rtrim(upper(rent_account_customer_summary.firstname)) 			= rtrim(upper({firstname_rent}))
     	and 	rtrim(upper(rent_account_customer_summary.surname))				= rtrim(upper({surname_rent}))
     	and 	rtrim(upper(rent_account_customer_summary.postcode))				= rtrim(upper({postcode_rent}))
)
THEN  
	'yes' 
ELSE   
	'no' 
END as rent_validated","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

Name: WCC_Radius_lookup
Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","systemID":"55dd90215f2e0","systemName":"WCC_Dataselects","query":"SELECT	CASE WHEN ExeterRefNo IS NULL THEN (REPLACE(Case_Reference_CSC,'AF','')) END AS Reference, 			
		CASE WHEN CSC.Source IS NULL THEN 'Exeter' ELSE CSC.Source END AS Source,			
		CASE WHEN [customer_details/first_namecaller] IS NULL THEN '' ELSE [customer_details/first_namecaller] END AS Forename, 
		CASE WHEN [customer_details/surnamecaller] IS NULL THEN '' ELSE [customer_details/surnamecaller] END AS Surname,
		CASE WHEN CSCHouseNameOrNo IS NULL THEN ExeterHouseNameNo ELSE CSCHouseNameOrNo END AS House, 
		CASE WHEN Address1 IS NULL THEN [customer_details/streetcaller] ELSE Address1 END AS Address1,
		CASE WHEN Address2 IS NULL THEN [customer_details/towncaller] ELSE Address2 END AS Address2, 
		CASE WHEN Address3 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE Address3 END AS Address3, 
		CASE WHEN Address4 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE Address4 END AS Address4,
		CASE WHEN ExeterPostcode IS NULL THEN CSCPostcode ELSE ExeterPostcode END AS Postcode,
		CASE WHEN RATING IS NULL THEN '' ELSE RATING END AS Rating, 					
		CASE WHEN Ex.Latitude IS NULL THEN CSCLatitude ELSE Ex.Latitude END AS Latitude, 			
		CASE WHEN Ex.Longitude IS NULL THEN CSCLongitude ELSE Ex.Longitude END AS Longitude,
		CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),CSC.Date_Visited,3)AS Date_Visited						
		FROM [WCCCustomerServiceData].[dbo].[ExeterHFS] Ex						
FULL OUTER JOIN	[WCCCustomerServiceData].[dbo].[CSCHFS] CSC							
ON
ExeterPostcode = CSCPostcode			
AND	
ExeterHouseNameNo = CSCHouseNameOrNo
WHERE 
(CSCPostcode IS NULL OR ExeterPostcode IS NULL)		
AND												
(CSCHouseNameOrNo IS NULL OR ExeterHouseNameNo IS NULL) 							
AND												
((CSCLatitude <= {bb_tl_lat} AND CSCLatitude >= {bb_bl_lat} AND CSCLongitude >= {bb_bl_lng} AND CSCLongitude <= {bb_br_lng}) 	
OR 
(Ex.Latitude <= {bb_tl_lat} AND Ex.Latitude >= {bb_bl_lat} AND Ex.Longitude >= {bb_bl_lng} AND Ex.Longitude <= {bb_br_lng}))","results_page_columns_db":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

Name: WCC LLPG get district from postcode - remove spaces
Output_template:
{"systemID":"556f28cda4af7","systemName":"DTF","query":"select district, postcode from (
select 'Warwick District Council' as district, postcode as postcode
from warwickshire_dtf.llpgcache where UPPER(REPLACE(postcode,' ',''))=UPPER(REPLACE({pass_postcode},' ','')) and {pass_postcode} <> ''
union 
select 'North Warwickshire District Council' as district, postcode as postcode
from northwarks_dtf.llpgcache where UPPER(REPLACE(postcode,' ',''))=UPPER(REPLACE({pass_postcode},' ','')) and {pass_postcode} <> ''
union 
select 'Stratford-on-Avon District Council' as district, postcode as postcode
from sdc_dtf.llpgcache where UPPER(REPLACE(postcode,' ',''))=UPPER(REPLACE({pass_postcode},' ','')) and {pass_postcode} <> ''
union 
select 'Rugby Borough Council' as district, postcode as postcode
 from rbc_dtf.llpgcache where UPPER(REPLACE(postcode,' ',''))=UPPER(REPLACE({pass_postcode},' ','')) and {pass_postcode} <> ''
union 
select 'Nuneaton and Bedworth District Council' as district, postcode as postcode
from nbbc_dtf.llpgcache where UPPER(REPLACE(postcode,' ',''))=UPPER(REPLACE({pass_postcode},' ','')) and {pass_postcode} <> ''
union
select 'not found' as district, {pass_postcode} as postcode) x
order by postcode
limit 1","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

case when ({CNone} = 'Yes' and Options = 'Yes' and {First} = 'Option') then 'No' else {C1} end as C1,
case when ({CNone} = 'Yes' and Options = 'Yes' and {First} = 'Option') then 'No' else {C2} end as C2,
case when ({CNone} = 'Yes' and Options = 'Yes' and {First} = 'Option') then 'No' else {C3} end as C3,
case when ({CNone} = 'Yes' and Options = 'Yes' and {First} = 'Option') then 'No' else {C4} end as C4,
case when ({CNone} = 'Yes' and Options = 'Yes' and {First} = 'Option') then 'No' else {C5} end as C5,
case when ({CNone} = 'Yes' and Options = 'Yes' and {First} = 'Option') then 'No' else {C6} end as C6,
case when ({CNone} = 'Yes' and Options = 'Yes' and {First} = 'Option') then 'No' else {C7} end as C7,
case when ({CNone} = 'Yes' and Options = 'Yes' and {First} = 'None') then 'No' else {CNone} end as CNone,
case
when ({CNone} = 'No' and Options = 'Yes') then 'Option'
when ({CNone} = 'Yes' and Options = 'No') then 'None'
when ({CNone} = 'Yes' and Options = 'Yes' and {First} = 'Option') then 'None'
when ({CNone} = 'Yes' and Options = 'Yes' and {First} = 'None') then 'Option' 
end as First
from
(select
case when ({C1} = 'Yes' or {C2} = 'Yes' or {C3} = 'Yes' or {C4} = 'Yes' or {C5} = 'Yes' or {C6} = 'Yes' or {C7} = 'Yes') then 'Yes'

Name: WCC LLPG Postcode lookup for Address subform
Output_template:
{"systemID":"556f28cda4af7","systemName":"DTF","query":"select CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',locality_name,', ',town_name,', ',county_name) as display, uprn as name,
sao as flat, pao as house,street_name as street,town_name as town, post_town, county_name as county,postcode,uprn,lng,lat, locality_name as locality,ward,usrn
FROM warwickshire_dtf.llpgcache
WHERE 
((uprn ={uprn}) and ({postcode_search}='')) or ((
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like {postcode_search})
)
AND length(REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))>5
) 

UNION 
select CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',locality_name,', ',town_name) as display, uprn as name,sao as flat,pao as house,street_name as street,town_name as town, post_town, county_name as county,postcode,uprn,lng,lat, locality_name as locality,ward,usrn
FROM northwarks_dtf.llpgcache

WHERE 
((uprn ={uprn}) and ({postcode_search}='')) or ((
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like {postcode_search})
)
AND length(REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))>5
) 

UNION
select CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',locality_name,', ',town_name) as display, uprn as name,
sao as flat,pao as house,street_name as street,town_name as town, post_town,  county_name as county,postcode,uprn,lng,lat, locality_name as locality,ward,usrn
FROM nbbc_dtf.llpgcache

WHERE 
((uprn ={uprn}) and ({postcode_search}='')) or ((
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like {postcode_search})
)
AND length(REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))>5
) 

UNION
select CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',locality_name,', ',town_name) as display, uprn as name,
sao as flat,pao as house,street_name as street,town_name as town, post_town, county_name as county,postcode,uprn,lng,lat, locality_name as locality,ward,usrn
FROM rbc_dtf.llpgcache

WHERE 
((uprn ={uprn}) and ({postcode_search}='')) or ((
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like {postcode_search})
)
AND length(REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))>5
) 
UNION
select CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',locality_name,', ',town_name) as display, uprn as name,
sao as flat,pao as house,street_name as street,town_name as town, post_town, county_name as county,postcode,uprn,lng,lat, locality_name as locality,ward,usrn
FROM sdc_dtf.llpgcache

WHERE 
((uprn ={uprn}) and ({postcode_search}='')) or ((
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like {postcode_search})
)
AND length(REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))>5
) 
ORDER BY street, house*1, house, flat ASC
LIMIT 750","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

Name: WCC ASC_Mosaic Validate Phone Number
Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","systemID":"55dd90215f2e0","systemName":"WCC_Dataselects","query":"declare @string varchar(1000) declare @checkText varchar(200) declare @checkPhone varchar(20) declare @phoneType varchar(20) declare @testChar varchar(1) declare @count int declare @index int set @checkText = '' set @count = 1 while (@count <= 3) begin if(@count = 1) begin set @string = {Home_Telephone_Number} set @phoneType = 'Home' end if(@count = 2) begin set @string = {Work_Telephone_Number} set @phoneType = 'Work' end if(@count = 3) begin set @string = {Mobile_Telephone_Number} set @phoneType = 'Mobile' end set @index = 1 set @checkPhone = 'ok' while (@index <= len(@string)) begin if(len(@string)<6) begin set @checkPhone = 'too few digits' end set @testChar = substring(@string, @index, 1) if(PATINDEX('[0-9]', @testChar) = 0 and @testChar<>' ' and @testChar<> '-') begin set @checkPhone = 'an invalid character' end set @index = @index + 1 if(@checkPhone <> 'ok') begin if(@checkText <> '') begin set @checkText = @checkText + '
' end set @checkText = @checkText + @phoneType + ' phone number contains ' + @checkPhone set @index = len(@string) + 1 end end set @count = @count + 1 end if(@checkText = '') begin set @checkText = 'ok' end select @checkText as phone_ok","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

Name: WCC_CopyCert_Basket_Read
Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","systemID":"55dd90215f2e0","systemName":"WCC_Dataselects","query":"declare @tablename varchar(50)
declare @where_statement varchar(200)

set @tablename = CASE
	WHEN '{#Environment}' = 'Test' THEN 'dbo.WCC_FS_CopyCert_Basket_Items_Test'
	ELSE 'dbo.WCC_FS_CopyCert_Basket_Items'
END
set @where_statement = 'where fs_reference = '''+'{#read_ref}'+'''and bmd_ref like '''+'{#office_ref}'+'%'''

declare @sql varchar(1000)

set @sql = '
Select convert(int, id) as id,convert(int, id) as db_id, bmd_ref, year, surname, forename, reason, reason_other, qty_ordered, place_of, date_of, maternal_forename, maternal_surname, paternal_forename, paternal_surname,fs_reference as case_ref_sub, cast(qty_ordered as int) * cast({#cert_price} as int) as Line_cost,
    case record_type
        when ''b'' then ''Birth''
        when ''m'' then ''Marriage''
        when ''d'' then ''Death''
        else ''Error''
    end as record_type,
    case SUBSTRING(bmd_ref, 1, 3)
        when ''770'' then ''Rugby''
        when ''773'' then ''Stratford''
        when ''775'' then ''Warwick''
        when ''767'' then ''Atherstone''
        when ''768'' then ''Nuneaton & Bedworth''
    end as office
from  ' + @tablename + ' ' + @where_statement + 'order by id'

exec (@sql)","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

Name: WCC_CopyCert_Basket_Write
Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","systemID":"5936895e9ff63","systemName":"WCC_Dataselects_WITH_WRITE_PRIVS","query":"-- INSERT BASKET DATA
declare @tablename varchar(50)
declare @insert_statement varchar(2000)
set @tablename = CASE
    WHEN '{#Environment}' = 'Test' THEN 'dbo.WCC_FS_CopyCert_Basket_Items_Test'
    ELSE 'dbo.WCC_FS_CopyCert_Basket_Items'
END
set @insert_statement = '(
    fs_reference, 
    bmd_ref, 
    year, 
    surname, 
    forename, 
    record_type, 
    reason, 
    reason_other, 
    place_of, 
    date_of, 
    quarter_of, 
    purpose, 
    maternal_forename, 
    maternal_surname, 
    paternal_forename, 
    paternal_surname,
    additional_information,
    age_at_death,
    any_other_names_used,
    date_of_birth,
    home_address,
    d_spouse_forename,
    d_spouse_surname,
    occupation,
    m_spouse_forename,
    m_spouse_surname,
    m_spouse_surname_other,
    qty_ordered
) values (
    ''{#case_ref}'', 
    ''{#cert_ref}'',
    ''{#cert_year}'',
    ''{#cert_surname}'',
    ''{#cert_firstname}'',
    ''{#Type_of_certificate}'',
    ''{#Relationship}'',
    ''{#Relationship_other}'',
    ''{#Place_of_Birth_Marriage_Death}'',
    ''{#Date_of_Birth_Marriage_Death}'',
    ''{#Quarter_of_Birth_Marriage_Death}'',
    ''{#cert_purpose}'',
    ''{#maternal_forename}'',
    ''{#maternal_surname}'',
    ''{#paternal_forename}'',
    ''{#paternal_surname}'',
    ''{#additional_information}'',
    ''{#age_at_death}'',
    ''{#any_other_names_used}'',
    ''{#date_of_birth}'',
    ''{#home_address}'',
    ''{#d_spouse_forename}'',
    ''{#d_spouse_surname}'',
    ''{#occupation}'',
    ''{#m_spouse_forename}'',
    ''{#m_spouse_surname}'',
    ''{#m_spouse_surname_other}'',
    1
)'

declare @sql varchar(2000)

set @sql = 'insert into ' + @tablename + ' ' + @insert_statement

exec (@sql)
;

-- RETURN RANDOM VAL TO MAKE A FIELD CHANGE
select
    RAND() as write_valid,
    '' as Place_of_Birth_Marriage_Death,
    '' as Place_not_known,
    '' as Date_of_Birth_Marriage_Death,
    '' as Date_not_known_,
    '' as Quarter_of_Birth_Marriage_Death,
    '' as paternal_forename,
    '' as Father_s_forename_s__not_known,
    '' as paternal_surname,
    '' as Father_s_surname_not_known_,
    '' as maternal_forename,
    '' as Mother_s_forename_s__not_known_,
    '' as maternal_surname,
    '' as Mother_s_surname_not_known_,
    '' as Relationship,
    '' as Relationship_other,
    '' as cert_purpose1,
    '' as cert_purpose2,
    '' as cert_ref,
    '' as additional_information,
    '' as age_at_death,
    '' as any_other_names_used,
    '' as date_of_birth,
    '' as home_address,
    '' as d_spouse_forename,
    '' as Spouse_forename_s__not_known_,
    '' as d_spouse_surname,
    '' as Spouse_surname_not_known_,
    '' as occupation,
    '' as m_spouse_forename,
    '' as m_spouse_surname,
    '' as m_spouse_surname_other,
    '' as cert_type,
    '' as cert_surname,
    '' as cert_firstname,
    '' as cert_year,
    '' as cert_registers_at,
    '' as dob_day,
    '' as dob_month,
    '' as dob_year
;","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

Name: Library Information
Category: WCC Very Simple Firmstep Test Builds
Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","systemID":"55dd90215f2e0","systemName":"WCC_Dataselects","query":"SELECT a.lib_id AS name, a.lib_name AS display, a.lib_email AS lib_email, a.lib_phone AS lib_phone,  a.lib_communitymanaged AS lib_communitymanaged,
ISNULL(a.lib_csa_ext,'x') as lib_csa_ext,
ISNULL(a.lib_alternative_1,'x') as lib_alternative_1,
ISNULL(a.lib_alternative_2,'x') as lib_alternative_2,
ISNULL(a.lib_alternative_3,'x') as lib_alternative_3,
ISNULL(a.lib_alternative_4,'x') as lib_alternative_4,
ISNULL(a.lib_alternative_5,'x') as lib_alternative_5,
ISNULL(a.lib_alternative_6,'x') as lib_alternative_6,
ISNULL(a.lib_alternative_7,'x') as lib_alternative_7,
ISNULL(a.lib_alternative_8,'x') as lib_alternative_8,
a.lib_hq as hq,
case
when a.lib_name = a.lib_hq then 'x'
when a.lib_csa_ext = b.lib_csa_ext then 'x'
else a.lib_hq end as hub,
case
when a.lib_name = a.lib_hq then 'x'
when a.lib_csa_ext = b.lib_csa_ext then 'x'
else ISNULL(b.lib_csa_ext,'x') end as hub_ext
FROM
wcc_lib_info a
left outer join wcc_lib b on a.lib_hq = b.lib_name
order by
case
when a.lib_name = 'TEST' then 'ZZZ'
else a.lib_name
end","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

Name: WCC_BB_AutoEvidenceIssues
Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","systemID":"55dd90215f2e0","systemName":"WCC_Dataselects","query":"select display as name, display from
(
select
'the image is not clear enough' as display, 1 as SortOrder
union
select
'the evidence received is not an accepted document' as display, 2 as SortOrder
union
select display, 3 as SortOrder
from
WCC_BB_Auto_EvidenceIssues
where
Criterion = 'C1' and {AutoCriterion/C1} = 'Yes'
union
select display, 4 as SortOrder
from
WCC_BB_Auto_EvidenceIssues
where
Criterion = 'C2' and {AutoCriterion/C2} = 'Yes'
union
select display, 5 as SortOrder
from
WCC_BB_Auto_EvidenceIssues
where
Criterion = 'C3' and {AutoCriterion/C3} = 'Yes'
union
select display, 6 as SortOrder
from
WCC_BB_Auto_EvidenceIssues
where
Criterion = 'C4' and {AutoCriterion/C4} = 'Yes'
union
select display, 7 as SortOrder
from
WCC_BB_Auto_EvidenceIssues
where
Criterion = 'C5' and {AutoCriterion/C5} = 'Yes'
union
select display, 8 as SortOrder
from
WCC_BB_Auto_EvidenceIssues
where

Name: WCC_ASC Lookup MultiQuestionSubform1
JH - BMD Lookup testing
Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","systemID":"55dd90215f2e0","systemName":"WCC_Dataselects","query":"declare @tablename varchar(50)
declare @Match_type varchar(10)
declare @sql varchar(2000)
declare @where_statement varchar(2000)

set @tablename = 'dbo.WCC_RegistrarsDeaths_Test'


set @Match_type = 'soundex';

set @where_statement = @Match_type +  '(surname) = ' + @Match_type +  '(''' + {Cert_Surname} + ''')'

set @sql = 'select year_date as cert_year, surname as cert_surname, firstname as cert_firstname, reference as cert_ref, case SUBSTRING(reference, 1, 3) when ''767'' then ''Atherstone'' when ''768'' then ''Nuneaton and Bedworth'' when ''770'' then ''Rugby'' when ''773'' then ''Stratford'' when ''775'' then ''Warwick'' end as cert_registers_at, '{Type_of_certificate}' as cert_type  from ' + @tablename + '  where ' + @where_statement

exec (@sql)","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

Name: WCC_EXOR_GetDocs with Status -  LIVE
Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","systemID":"593a6d276ffd4","systemName":"ATLS LIVE Bentley / Exor","query":"select
    DOC_COMPL_LOCATION,
    DOC_DATE_ISSUED,
    DOC_COMPL_EAST,
    DOC_COMPL_NORTH,
    DOC_DESCR,
    case DOC_STATUS_CODE
        when 'RE' then 'Report received and will be looked at by our Highways team'
        when 'RF' then 'Report has been referred to responsible owner / organisation'
        when 'DR' then 'A report has been registered as a defect'
        when 'WI' then 'Defect has been scheduled for maintainence'
        when 'DU' then 'A reported defect is a duplicate of an existing defect'
        when 'CO' then 'Report has been resolved'
        when 'NF' then 'Report does not meet our eligibility criteria (http://www.warwickshire.gov.uk/potholes)'
        else 'Pending'
    end as DOC_REASON,
    case DOC_STATUS_CODE
        when 'RE' then 'red'
        when 'RF' then 'noright'
        when 'DR' then 'amber'
        when 'WI' then 'blue'
        when 'CO' then 'green'
when 'DU' then 'exclaim'
when 'NF' then 'black'
        else 'Pending'
    end as icon_type
from docs
where 
    DOC_COMPL_NORTH is not null -- has coords
    and ( DOC_COMPL_COMPLETE is null or DOC_COMPL_COMPLETE >= sysdate - 28 ) -- incomplete or complete within a fortnight
and DOC_COMPL_TYPE = 'PO'","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

Name: LLPG Postcode with seperate lat lng
Output_template:
{"systemID":"556f28cda4af7","systemName":"DTF","query":"select CONCAT(lat) as lat
,CONCAT(lng) as lng
FROM warwickshire_dtf.llpgcache
WHERE 
REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({postcode_forlatlng},' ','')
AND 
length(REPLACE({postcode_forlatlng},' ','')>5
) 

UNION
select CONCAT(lat) as lat
,CONCAT(lng) as lng 
FROM northwarks_dtf.llpgcache
WHERE 
REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({postcode_forlatlng},' ','')
AND 
length(REPLACE({postcode_forlatlng},' ','')>5
) 


UNION
select CONCAT(lat) as lat
,CONCAT(lng) as lng
FROM nbbc_dtf.llpgcache
WHERE 
REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({postcode_forlatlng},' ','')
AND 
length(REPLACE({postcode_forlatlng},' ','')>5
) 


UNION
select CONCAT(lat) as lat
,CONCAT(lng) as lng 
FROM sdc_dtf.llpgcache
WHERE 
REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({postcode_forlatlng},' ','')

) 

UNION

,CONCAT(lng) as lng

)

Name: WCC_MultipleEmails1
Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","systemID":"55dd90215f2e0","systemName":"WCC_Dataselects","query":"create table #emailResults (email varchar(255)) 

declare @string varchar(255) 
set @string = {MultipleEmail1}

declare @index int 
set @index = -1 

while (@index<>0) 
begin 
declare @substr varchar(100) 
set @index=charindex(',',@string) 

if (@index<>0) 
begin 
set @substr=left(@string,@index-1) 
set @string=right(@string, len(@string)-@index) 
end 

else set @substr=@string 

insert into #emailResults values (@substr) 

end 

select email from #emailResults

drop table #emailResults","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

Name: MyService Basic LLPG
Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","systemID":"59a682ef9a716","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","query":"select 
concat(rtrim(ltrim(concat(sao,' ',pao))),' ',street_name,', ',town_name) as display,
uprn as name,
sao as flat,
pao as house,
 street_name as street,
town_name as town , 
county_name as county, 
locality_name as locality, 
postcode,
uprn,
ward,
lng,
lat,
usrn 

FROM llpgcache
WHERE 
(
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))
OR concat(rtrim(ltrim(concat(sao,' ',pao))),' ',street_name) like concat('%',{postcode_search},'%')
)
AND length(REPLACE({postcode_search},' ','')) > 5
ORDER BY pao,sao,street_name ASC
LIMIT 100","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

Name: WCC_LibraryInfo
Category: WCC Very Simple Firmstep Test Builds
Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","systemID":"55dd90215f2e0","systemName":"WCC_Dataselects","query":"SELECT a.lib_id AS name, a.lib_name AS display, a.lib_email AS lib_email, a.lib_phone AS lib_phone,  a.lib_communitymanaged AS lib_communitymanaged,
ISNULL(a.lib_csa_ext,'x') as lib_csa_ext,
ISNULL(a.lib_alternative_1,'x') as lib_alternative_1,
ISNULL(a.lib_alternative_2,'x') as lib_alternative_2,
ISNULL(a.lib_alternative_3,'x') as lib_alternative_3,
ISNULL(a.lib_alternative_4,'x') as lib_alternative_4,
ISNULL(a.lib_alternative_5,'x') as lib_alternative_5,
ISNULL(a.lib_alternative_6,'x') as lib_alternative_6,
ISNULL(a.lib_alternative_7,'x') as lib_alternative_7,
ISNULL(a.lib_alternative_8,'x') as lib_alternative_8,
a.lib_hq as hq,
case
when a.lib_name = a.lib_hq then 'x'
when a.lib_csa_ext = b.lib_csa_ext then 'x'
else a.lib_hq end as hub,
case
when a.lib_name = a.lib_hq then 'x'
when a.lib_csa_ext = b.lib_csa_ext then 'x'
else ISNULL(b.lib_csa_ext,'x') end as hub_ext
FROM
wcc_lib_info a
left outer join wcc_lib b on a.lib_hq = b.lib_name
order by
case
when a.lib_name = 'TEST' then 'ZZZ'
else a.lib_name
end","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

Name: WCC_Find_AnonFilled_By_User
Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","systemID":"5922bf5b1c41d","systemName":"WCC SQL Dump","query":"-- Declarations
declare
	@dbname_cursor as cursor,
	@dbname as varchar(255),
	@exec_string as varchar(1255)
;
declare
	@temptable as table( reference varchar(40), username varchar(255), dbname varchar(255), created_date varchar(25) )
;

begin
	IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#wcc_temp_results') IS NOT NULL     --Remove temp table if exists
		DROP TABLE #wcc_temp_results   -- Remove temp table
    
    -- Get list of forms/processes
	set @dbname_cursor = CURSOR for
		SELECT table_name
		FROM [WCCCustomerServiceReports].information_schema.tables
		where 
			TABLE_NAME like 'p_%' 
			or TABLE_NAME like 'form_%'
		order by table_name
	
	-- iterate through tables
	open @dbname_cursor
	fetch next from @dbname_cursor into @dbname
	
	while @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
	begin
		set @dbname = '[WCCCustomerServiceReports].[dbo].[' + @dbname + ']'
		-- ignore tables without created_by columns
		IF COL_LENGTH(@dbname,'created_by') IS NOT NULL
		begin
			-- add results into temp table
			set @exec_string = '
				select
					d.reference,
					c.display_name,
					''' + @dbname + ''' as dbname,
					convert(varchar(25), d.created_date, 120) as created_date
				from ' + @dbname + ' d
					inner join [WCCCustomerServiceReports].[dbo].[case] c
					on d.reference = c.case_reference
				where 
					( d.created_by = ''0'' or d.created_by = ''undefined'' )
					and d.created_date between ''{#DateTimeFrom}'' and ''{#DateTimeTo}''
					and c.username = ''{#lookup_value}''
				'
			insert into @temptable exec(@exec_string)
		end;
		fetch next from @dbname_cursor into @dbname
	end;
	
	-- output temp table contents
	select reference, username, created_date
            from @temptable order by created_date desc
end;","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

Name: WCC_CT_LSO_Options_v3
Output_template:
{"systemID":"556f28cda4af7","systemName":"DTF","query":"select name, name as display from
(
select
case when {calc_existingPassFound} = 0 and {calc_inWarks} = 1 then 'New application'
else 'None'
end as name, 1 as SortOrder
union
select
case when {calc_existingPassFound} = 1  then 'Cancel - moved out of area'
else 'None'
end as name, 3 as SortOrder
union
select
case when {calc_existingPassFound} = 1 and {calc_inWarks} = 0 then 'Cancel - pass holder deceased'
else 'None'
end as name, 2 as SortOrder
union
select
case when {calc_existingPassFound} = 1 and {calc_inWarks} = 1 and ({calc_passType}='Age'  or {calc_passPerm}<>0) and {calc_passExp} < 33 then 'Renew pass'
else 'None'
end as name, 1 as SortOrder
union
select
case when {calc_existingPassFound} = 1 and {calc_inWarks} = 1 and {calc_passExp} > 32 and ({calc_passType}='Age'  or {calc_passPerm}<>0) then 'Replace pass'
else 'None'
end as name, 1 as SortOrder
union
select
case when {calc_existingPassFound} = 1 and {calc_inWarks} = 1 and {calc_passExp} > 32 and ({calc_passType}<>'Age'  and {calc_passPerm}=0) then 'Replace pass'
else 'None'
end as name, 1 as SortOrder
union
select
case when {calc_existingPassFound} = 1 and {calc_inWarks} = 1 then 'Change pass details'
else 'None'
end as name, 2 as SortOrder
union
select
case when {calc_existingPassFound} = 1 and {calc_inWarks} = 1 then 'Cancel - pass no longer required'
else 'None'
end as name, 3 as SortOrder
union
select
case when {calc_existingPassFound} = 1 and {calc_inWarks} = 1 then 'Cancel - pass holder deceased'
else 'None'
end as name, 4 as SortOrder
union
select
case when {calc_existingPassFound} = 1 and {calc_inWarks} = 1 and {calc_passPerm}=0 and {calc_passType}<>'Age' and {calc_passExp} < 33 then 'Renew temporary disabled person''s pass (requires new evidence)'
else 'None'
end as name, 0 as SortOrder
union
select
'No further action' as name, 20 as SortOrder
)x
where name <> 'None' and name <> 'No further action'
order by SortOrder","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

Name: Letter Generation - Save Letter
WCC_CT Check Age Eligible DoBCalc_ISO
Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","systemID":"5922bf5b1c41d","systemName":"WCC SQL Dump","query":"select coalesce(min(edate),
 convert(datetime,dateadd(mm,756,{DoBCalc_ISO}))) as age_eligible_on
 , case when min(edate)<getdate() then 'Eligible now' 
 when min(edate)<dateadd(dd,14,getdate())
 then 'Eligible in less than 2 weeks'
 when min(edate)<dateadd(mm,1,getdate())
 then 'Eligible in less than 1 month'
 when min(edate)<dateadd(yy,1,getdate()) 
 then 'Eligible in less than 1 year' 
 else 'Not eligible for at least a year' 
 end as AgeResult
 , case when convert(datetime,dateadd(mm, -1, min(edate)))<getdate() 
 then 1 else 0 end as age_eligible 
 from [WCCCustomerServiceReports].[dbo].[pensionage]
  where bdate>={DoBCalc_ISO} and {DoBCalc_ISO}<>''","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

Name: WCC_CT_Location_PayMethods_ByLocName
Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","systemID":"55dd90215f2e0","systemName":"WCC_Dataselects","query":"DECLARE @payloc varchar(100);
SET @payloc = {payment_location};
if (@payloc = 'Shire Hall CSC') begin
set @payloc = 'Shire Hall  CSC';
end;
select name, name as display from
(
select
case when ChequePayTo <> 'None' then 'Cheque'
else 'None'
end as name
from WCC_OSS_Information where Location =  @payloc
union
select
case when ChequePayTo <> 'None' then 'Postal order'
else 'None'
end as name
from WCC_OSS_Information where Location =  @payloc
union
select
case when CardPayTo <> 'None' then 'Debit card'
else 'None'
end as name
from WCC_OSS_Information where Location =  @payloc
union
select
case when CardPayTo <> 'None' then 'Credit card'
else 'None'
end as name
from WCC_OSS_Information where Location =  @payloc
union
select
case when CashPayTo <> 'None' then 'Cash'
else 'None'
end as name
from WCC_OSS_Information where Location =  @payloc
union
select'Unable to pay now' as name
) x
where name <> 'None'","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","systemID":"55dd90215f2e0","systemName":"WCC_Dataselects","query":"SELECT	CASE WHEN ExeterRefNo IS NULL THEN (REPLACE(Case_Reference_CSC,'AF','')) END AS Reference,
		CASE WHEN CSC.Status IS NULL THEN '' ELSE CSC.Status END AS Status,		
		CASE WHEN CSC.Source IS NULL THEN 'Exeter' ELSE CSC.Source END AS Source,			
		CASE WHEN [customer_details/first_namecaller] IS NULL THEN '' ELSE [customer_details/first_namecaller] END AS Forename, 
		CASE WHEN [customer_details/surnamecaller] IS NULL THEN '' ELSE [customer_details/surnamecaller] END AS Surname,
		CASE WHEN CSCHouseNameOrNo IS NULL THEN ExeterHouseNameNo ELSE CSCHouseNameOrNo END AS House, 
		CASE WHEN Address1 IS NULL THEN [customer_details/streetcaller] ELSE Address1 END AS Address1,
		CASE WHEN Address2 IS NULL THEN [customer_details/towncaller] ELSE Address2 END AS Address2, 
		CASE WHEN Address3 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE Address3 END AS Address3, 
		CASE WHEN Address4 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE Address4 END AS Address4,
		CASE WHEN ExeterPostcode IS NULL THEN CSCPostcode ELSE ExeterPostcode END AS Postcode,
		CASE WHEN RATING IS NULL THEN '' ELSE RATING END AS Rating, 					
		CASE WHEN Ex.Latitude IS NULL THEN CSCLatitude ELSE Ex.Latitude END AS Latitude, 			
		CASE WHEN Ex.Longitude IS NULL THEN CSCLongitude ELSE Ex.Longitude END AS Longitude,
		CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),CSC.Date_Visited,3)AS Date_Visited						
		FROM [WCCCustomerServiceData].[dbo].[ExeterHFS] Ex						
FULL OUTER JOIN	[WCCCustomerServiceData].[dbo].[CSCHFS] CSC							
ON
ExeterPostcode = CSCPostcode			
AND	
ExeterHouseNameNo = CSCHouseNameOrNo
WHERE 
(CSCPostcode IS NULL OR ExeterPostcode IS NULL)		
AND												
(CSCHouseNameOrNo IS NULL OR ExeterHouseNameNo IS NULL) 							
AND
(CSC.Status = 'Arrange Fire Safety Visit' OR
CSC.Status = 'Booked Fire Safety Visit' OR
CSC.Status = 'Planned Re-visit' OR
CSC.Status IS NULL)
AND	
((CSCLatitude <= {bb_tl_lat} AND CSCLatitude >= {bb_bl_lat} AND CSCLongitude >= {bb_bl_lng} AND CSCLongitude <= {bb_br_lng}) 	
OR 
(Ex.Latitude <= {bb_tl_lat} AND Ex.Latitude >= {bb_bl_lat} AND Ex.Longitude >= {bb_bl_lng} AND Ex.Longitude <= {bb_br_lng}))","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

Name: WCC - CT Self - Date difference in months
Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","systemID":"55dd90215f2e0","systemName":"WCC_Dataselects","query":"Declare @now DATE
Declare @passExpiry DATE
Declare @Result INT

SET @now = {dnow_iso}
SET @passExpiry = {Pass_expiry} 

SET @Result = (
	SELECT CASE
		WHEN DATEPART(DAY, @now) > DATEPART(DAY, @passExpiry)	
		THEN DATEDIFF(MONTH, @now, @passExpiry) - 1
		ELSE DATEDIFF(MONTH, @now, @passExpiry)
	END
)

SELECT 
	CASE WHEN @Result < 1 OR (@Result = 1 AND {Pass_expiry_date} = DateAdd(month,1,{dnow}) ) THEN 'true'
ELSE
	'false'
END AS difference","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

{"lookup_validation":"0","systemID":"55dd90215f2e0","systemName":"WCC_Dataselects","query":"SELECT	CASE WHEN ExeterRefNo IS NULL THEN (REPLACE(Case_Reference_CSC,'AF','')) END AS Reference,
		CASE WHEN CSC.Status IS NULL THEN '' ELSE CSC.Status END AS Status,		
		CASE WHEN CSC.Source IS NULL THEN 'Exeter' ELSE CSC.Source END AS Source,			
		CASE WHEN [customer_details/first_namecaller] IS NULL THEN '' ELSE [customer_details/first_namecaller] END AS Forename, 
		CASE WHEN [customer_details/surnamecaller] IS NULL THEN '' ELSE [customer_details/surnamecaller] END AS Surname,
		CASE WHEN CSCHouseNameOrNo IS NULL THEN ExeterHouseNameNo ELSE CSCHouseNameOrNo END AS House, 
		CASE WHEN Address1 IS NULL THEN [customer_details/streetcaller] ELSE Address1 END AS Address1,
		CASE WHEN Address2 IS NULL THEN [customer_details/towncaller] ELSE Address2 END AS Address2, 
		CASE WHEN Address3 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE Address3 END AS Address3, 
		CASE WHEN Address4 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE Address4 END AS Address4,
		CASE WHEN ExeterPostcode IS NULL THEN CSCPostcode ELSE ExeterPostcode END AS Postcode,
		CASE WHEN RATING IS NULL THEN '' ELSE RATING END AS Rating, 					
		CASE WHEN Ex.Latitude IS NULL THEN CSCLatitude ELSE Ex.Latitude END AS Latitude, 			
		CASE WHEN Ex.Longitude IS NULL THEN CSCLongitude ELSE Ex.Longitude END AS Longitude,
		CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),CSC.Date_Visited,3)AS Date_Visited						
		FROM [WCCCustomerServiceData].[dbo].[ExeterHFS] Ex						
FULL OUTER JOIN	[WCCCustomerServiceData].[dbo].[CSCHFS] CSC							
ON
ExeterPostcode = CSCPostcode			
AND	
ExeterHouseNameNo = CSCHouseNameOrNo
WHERE 
(CSCPostcode IS NULL OR ExeterPostcode IS NULL)		
AND												
(CSCHouseNameOrNo IS NULL OR ExeterHouseNameNo IS NULL) 							
AND
(CSC.Status = 'Arrange Fire Safety Visit' OR
CSC.Status = 'Booked Fire Safety Visit' OR
CSC.Status = 'Planned Re-visit' OR
CSC.Status IS NULL)
AND	
((CSCLatitude <= {bb_tl_lat} AND CSCLatitude >= {bb_bl_lat} AND CSCLongitude >= {bb_bl_lng} AND CSCLongitude <= {bb_br_lng}) 	
OR

set @where_statement = 'where fs_reference = ''{#case_ref}'''

-- this delete is important as worldpay connector can make a form stage submit more than once, believe it or not. This prevents WP from creating dupe insertions.

;

exec (@sql1)
;

declare @insert_statement varchar(200)

	ELSE 'dbo.WCC_FS_CopyCert_Order_Log_Test'
END

set @insert_statement = '(order_line_id, comment, creator) select id, ''Requested'', ''Customer'' from'

;","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

Output_template:
{"systemID":"55dd90215f2e0","systemName":"WCC_Dataselects","query":"declare @tablename1 varchar(50)
declare @where_statement varchar(200)
declare @orderby_statement varchar(200)

set @tablename1 = CASE
    WHEN '{#Environment}' = 'Test' THEN 'dbo.WCC_FS_CopyCert_Basket_Items_Test'
    ELSE 'dbo.WCC_FS_CopyCert_Basket_Items'
END
set @where_statement = 'where fs_reference = ''{#read_ref}'' and (bmd_ref like ''{#office_ref}%'' or bmd_ref like ''{#officereftwo}/%'')'
set @orderby_statement = 'order by surname, forename'

declare @sql varchar(1500)

set @sql = 'Select convert(int, id) as id, bmd_ref, qty_ordered, year, surname, forename, reason, reason_other, place_of, date_of, 
quarter_of, purpose,
    case record_type
        when ''b'' then ''Birth''
        when ''m'' then ''Marriage''
        when ''d'' then ''Death''
        else ''Error''
    end as record_type,
    case SUBSTRING(bmd_ref, 1, 3)
        when ''770'' then ''Rugby''
        when ''773'' then ''Stratford''
        when ''775'' then ''Warwick''
        when ''767'' then ''Atherstone''
        when ''768'' then ''Nuneaton & Bedworth''
    end as office
      ,[fs_reference]
      ,[maternal_forename]
      ,[maternal_surname]
      ,[paternal_forename]
      ,[paternal_surname]
      ,[additional_information]
      ,[age_at_death]
      ,[any_other_names_used]
      ,[date_of_birth]
      ,[home_address]
      ,[d_spouse_forename]
      ,[d_spouse_surname]
      ,[occupation]
      ,[m_spouse_forename]
      ,[m_spouse_surname]
      ,[m_spouse_surname_other]
from ' + @tablename1 + ' ' + @where_statement + ' ' + @orderby_statement

exec (@sql)
;","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

Name: WCC_CopyCert_Action_Summary
Category: Copy Certificates - Births, Deaths and Marriages
Output_template:
{"systemID":"55dd90215f2e0","systemName":"WCC_Dataselects","query":"select oi.fs_reference as fs_reference, oi.bmd_ref as bmd_ref, oi.qty_ordered as qty_ordered, oi.forename as forename, oi.surname as surname, oi.year as year, li.was_provided as was_provided, li.was_refused as was_refused, oi.id as line_id,
    case record_type
        when 'b' then 'Birth'
        when 'm' then 'Marriage'
        when 'd' then 'Death'
        else 'Error'
    end as record_type,
    case when li.was_provided='1' then 'To be provided' else 'Refused. To be refunded' end as action
from [WCCCustomerServiceData].[dbo].[WCC_FS_CopyCert_Order_Log] li
	inner join [WCCCustomerServiceData].[dbo].[WCC_FS_CopyCert_Ordered_Items] oi
		on oi.id = li.order_line_id
	inner join (
		select l.order_line_id, max(l.id) maxid
		from [WCCCustomerServiceData].[dbo].[WCC_FS_CopyCert_Ordered_Items] o
			inner join [WCCCustomerServiceData].[dbo].[WCC_FS_CopyCert_Order_Log] l
				on l.order_line_id = o.id
		where
			o.fs_reference = {read_ref}

oi.bmd_ref like {office_ref}+'%' or oi.bmd_ref like {office_ref_alternative}+'%'

Name: WCC_CopyCert_Action_Summary_Test
Category: Copy Certificates - Births, Deaths and Marriages
Output_template:
{"systemID":"55dd90215f2e0","systemName":"WCC_Dataselects","query":"/* ** Select final approval status of order line items **
This was properly commented in the SQL but FS breaks if you try to do that so comments had to be stripped. Inner subquery selects the final state of order item lines for the FS reference. Outer query uses that result to retrieve the order info to accompany the status from the Log
*/

select oi.fs_reference, oi.bmd_ref, oi.qty_ordered, oi.forename, oi.surname, oi.year, li.was_provided, li.was_refused, oi.id as line_id,
case record_type
when 'b' then 'Birth'
when 'm' then 'Marriage'
when 'd' then 'Death'
else 'Error'
end as record_type,
case
when li.was_provided=1 then 'To be provided'
when li.was_refused=1 then 'Refused. To be refunded'
when li.was_refused=0 and li.was_provided=0 then 'Action Needed'
end as action
from [WCCCustomerServiceData].[dbo].[WCC_FS_CopyCert_Order_Log_Test] li
inner join [WCCCustomerServiceData].[dbo].[WCC_FS_CopyCert_Ordered_Items_Test] oi
on oi.id = li.order_line_id
inner join (
select l.order_line_id, max(l.id) maxid
from [WCCCustomerServiceData].[dbo].[WCC_FS_CopyCert_Ordered_Items_Test] o
inner join [WCCCustomerServiceData].[dbo].[WCC_FS_CopyCert_Order_Log_Test] l
on l.order_line_id = o.id
where
o.fs_reference = {read_ref}
/* and (l.was_provided = 1 or l.was_refused = 1)*/
group by l.order_line_id
) a
on a.maxid = li.id
where
oi.bmd_ref like {office_ref}+'%' or oi.bmd_ref like {office_ref_alternative}+'%'
order by li.id","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","systemID":"55dd90215f2e0","systemName":"WCC_Dataselects","query":"DECLARE @mapIconUnselectedGold varchar(250) = '//maps.gstatic.com/mapfiles/ridefinder-images/mm_20_yellow.png'; DECLARE @mapIconUnselectedSilver varchar(250) = '//maps.gstatic.com/mapfiles/ridefinder-images/mm_20_white.png'; DECLARE @mapIconUnselectedBronze varchar(250) = '//maps.gstatic.com/mapfiles/ridefinder-images/mm_20_brown.png'; DECLARE @mapIconUnselectedUndefined varchar(250) = '//fs-filestore-eu.s3.amazonaws.com/warwickshire/WCC/Assets/mapiconscollection-markers/house.png'; SELECT CASE WHEN Ex.Latitude IS NULL THEN CSCLatitude ELSE Ex.Latitude END AS lat, CASE WHEN Ex.Longitude IS NULL THEN CSCLongitude ELSE Ex.Longitude END AS lng, CASE WHEN ExeterPostcode IS NULL THEN CSCPostcode ELSE ExeterPostcode END AS display, CASE WHEN ExeterRefNo IS NULL THEN (REPLACE(Case_Reference_CSC,'AF','')) END AS name, CASE WHEN RATING ='Bronze' THEN @mapIconUnselectedBronze WHEN RATING ='Silver' THEN @mapIconUnselectedSilver WHEN RATING='Gold' THEN @mapIconUnselectedGold ELSE @mapIconUnselectedUndefined END as mapIconUnselected, CASE WHEN RATING ='Bronze' THEN @mapIconUnselectedBronze WHEN RATING ='Silver' THEN @mapIconUnselectedSilver WHEN RATING='Gold' THEN @mapIconUnselectedGold ELSE @mapIconUnselectedUndefined END as mapIconSelected, (' Rating '+CASE WHEN RATING IS NULL THEN '' ELSE RATING END+'
Source '+CASE WHEN CSC.Source IS NULL THEN 'Exeter' ELSE CSC.Source END+'
House '+CASE WHEN CSC.CSCHouseNameOrNo IS NULL THEN Ex.ExeterHouseNameNo ELSE CSC.CSCHouseNameOrNo END+'
Address1 '+CASE WHEN Ex.Address1 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE Ex.Address1 END +'
Address2 '+CASE WHEN CSC.[customer_details/streetcaller] IS NULL THEN Ex.Address2 ELSE CSC.[customer_details/streetcaller] END+'
Address3 '+CASE WHEN Address3 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE Address3 END+'
Address4 '+CASE WHEN CSC.[customer_details/towncaller] IS NULL THEN Ex.Address4 ELSE CSC.[customer_details/towncaller] END+'
Postcode '+CASE WHEN CSC.CSCPostcode IS NULL THEN Ex.ExeterPostcode ELSE CSC.CSCPostcode END+'
') AS description FROM [WCCCustomerServiceData].[dbo].[ExeterHFS] Ex FULL OUTER JOIN [WCCCustomerServiceData].[dbo].[CSCHFS] CSC ON ExeterPostcode = CSCPostcode AND ExeterHouseNameNo = CSCHouseNameOrNo WHERE (CSCPostcode IS NULL OR ExeterPostcode IS NULL) AND (CSCHouseNameOrNo IS NULL OR ExeterHouseNameNo IS NULL) AND (CSC.Status = 'Arrange Fire Safety Visit' OR CSC.Status = 'Booked Fire Safety Visit' OR CSC.Status = 'Planned Re-visit' OR CSC.Status IS NULL) --AND --((CSCLatitude <= 52.35166265945955 AND CSCLatitude >= 52.34838587981384 AND CSCLongitude >= -1.587353293284650--1 AND CSCLongitude <= -1.5792101067154363) --OR --(Ex.Latitude <= 52.35166265945955 AND Ex.Latitude >= 52.34838587981384 AND Ex.Longitude >= -1.5873532932846501 --AND Ex.Longitude <= -1.5792101067154363))","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

Name: WCC_CopyCert_Find_Refunds_Test
Category: Copy Certificates - Births, Deaths and Marriages
Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","systemID":"55dd90215f2e0","systemName":"WCC_Dataselects","query":"/* ** Look for refunds to be done
If a query returns any rows then FS thinks it's "valid",
if it returns no rows then it's "invalid". So, if there's
no refunds then there's no results here.
*/

select oi.fs_reference,oi.fs_reference as refund_ref,oi.qty_ordered, oi.surname, oi.bmd_ref, li.was_provided, li.was_refused, oi.id as line_id,(oi.qty_ordered * {cert_price}) as line_cost_display,(oi.qty_ordered * {cert_price}) as Line_cost,
    case oi.record_type
        when 'b' then 'Birth'
        when 'm' then 'Marriage'
        when 'd' then 'Death'
        else 'Error'
    end as record_type,
    case SUBSTRING(oi.bmd_ref, 1, 3)
        when '770' then 'Rugby'
        when '773' then 'Stratford'
        when '775' then 'Warwick'
        when '767' then 'Atherstone'
        when '768' then 'Nuneaton & Bedworth'
    end as office
from [WCCCustomerServiceData].[dbo].[WCC_FS_CopyCert_Order_Log_Test] li
        inner join [WCCCustomerServiceData].[dbo].[WCC_FS_CopyCert_Ordered_Items_Test] oi
                on oi.id = li.order_line_id
        inner join (
                select l.order_line_id, max(l.id) maxid
                from [WCCCustomerServiceData].[dbo].[WCC_FS_CopyCert_Ordered_Items_Test] o
                        inner join [WCCCustomerServiceData].[dbo].[WCC_FS_CopyCert_Order_Log_Test] l
                                on l.order_line_id = o.id
                where
                        o.fs_reference = '{#read_ref}'
                        and (l.was_provided = 1 or l.was_refused = 1)
                group by l.order_line_id
        ) a
                on a.maxid = li.id

Name: WCC_CopyCert_Find_Refunds
Category: Copy Certificates - Births, Deaths and Marriages
Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","systemID":"55dd90215f2e0","systemName":"WCC_Dataselects","query":"/* ** Look for refunds to be done
If a query returns any rows then FS thinks it's "valid",
if it returns no rows then it's "invalid". So, if there's
no refunds then there's no results here.
*/

select oi.fs_reference,oi.fs_reference as refund_ref,oi.qty_ordered, oi.surname, oi.bmd_ref, li.was_provided, li.was_refused, oi.id as line_id,(oi.qty_ordered * {cert_price}) as line_cost_display,(oi.qty_ordered * {cert_price}) as Line_cost,
    case oi.record_type
        when 'b' then 'Birth'
        when 'm' then 'Marriage'
        when 'd' then 'Death'
        else 'Error'
    end as record_type,
    case SUBSTRING(oi.bmd_ref, 1, 3)
        when '770' then 'Rugby'
        when '773' then 'Stratford'
        when '775' then 'Warwick'
        when '767' then 'Atherstone'
        when '768' then 'Nuneaton & Bedworth'
    end as office
from [WCCCustomerServiceData].[dbo].[WCC_FS_CopyCert_Order_Log] li
	inner join [WCCCustomerServiceData].[dbo].[WCC_FS_CopyCert_Ordered_Items] oi
		on oi.id = li.order_line_id
	inner join (
		select l.order_line_id, max(l.id) maxid
		from [WCCCustomerServiceData].[dbo].[WCC_FS_CopyCert_Ordered_Items] o
			inner join [WCCCustomerServiceData].[dbo].[WCC_FS_CopyCert_Order_Log] l
				on l.order_line_id = o.id
		where
			o.fs_reference = '{#read_ref}'
			and (l.was_provided = 1 or l.was_refused = 1)
		group by l.order_line_id
	) a
		on a.maxid = li.id
where li.was_refused = 1","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

Name: Matt List table column details
Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","systemID":"55dd90215f2e0","systemName":"WCC_Dataselects","query":"select
   syscolumns.name as [ColumnName],
   CASE WHEN syscolumns.xtype = 34 THEN 'IMAGE'
  WHEN syscolumns.xtype = 35 THEN 'TEXT'
  WHEN syscolumns.xtype = 36 THEN 'UNIQUEIDENTIFIER'
  WHEN syscolumns.xtype = 48 THEN 'TINYINT'
  WHEN syscolumns.xtype = 52 THEN 'SMALLINT'
  WHEN syscolumns.xtype = 56 THEN 'INT'
  WHEN syscolumns.xtype = 58 THEN 'SMALLDATETIME'
  WHEN syscolumns.xtype = 59 THEN 'REAL'
  WHEN syscolumns.xtype = 60 THEN 'MONEY'
  WHEN syscolumns.xtype = 61 THEN 'DATETIME'
  WHEN syscolumns.xtype = 62 THEN 'FLOAT'
  WHEN syscolumns.xtype = 98 THEN 'SQL_VARIANT'
  WHEN syscolumns.xtype = 99 THEN 'NTEXT'
  WHEN syscolumns.xtype = 104 THEN 'BIT'
  WHEN syscolumns.xtype = 106 THEN 'DECIMAL(' + CONVERT(VARCHAR,syscolumns.xprec) + ',' + CONVERT(VARCHAR,syscolumns.xscale)+ ')'
  WHEN syscolumns.xtype = 108 THEN 'NUMERIC(' + CONVERT(VARCHAR,syscolumns.xprec) + ',' + CONVERT(VARCHAR,syscolumns.xscale)+ ')'
  WHEN syscolumns.xtype = 122 THEN 'SMALLMONEY'
  WHEN syscolumns.xtype = 127 THEN 'BIGINT'
  WHEN syscolumns.xtype = 165 THEN 'VARBINARY'
  WHEN syscolumns.xtype = 167 THEN 'VARCHAR(' + CONVERT(VARCHAR,syscolumns.length) + ')'
  WHEN syscolumns.xtype = 173 THEN 'BINARY(' + CONVERT(VARCHAR,syscolumns.length) + ')'
  WHEN syscolumns.xtype = 175 THEN 'CHAR(' + CONVERT(VARCHAR,syscolumns.length) + ')'
  WHEN syscolumns.xtype = 189 THEN 'TIMESTAMP'
  WHEN syscolumns.xtype = 231 THEN 'NVARCHAR(' + CONVERT(VARCHAR,syscolumns.prec) + ')'
  WHEN syscolumns.xtype = 239 THEN 'NCHAR(' + CONVERT(VARCHAR,syscolumns.prec) + ')'
  ELSE '???' END AS columnObjtype
   
from 
   sysobjects 
inner join 
   syscolumns on sysobjects.id = syscolumns.id
where sysobjects.xtype = 'u'
and   sysobjects.name = {tablename}
order by syscolumns.name","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

Name: JC Training - Find Column
Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","systemID":"587f6f88f0c50","systemName":"af-data-dump","query":"SELECT 
	OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME([T].[object_id],DB_ID()) AS SchemaName
        ,[T].[name] AS TableName
       ,[AC].[name] AS ColumnName
        ,[TY].[name] AS DataType
        ,[AC].[max_length] AS MaxLength
        ,[AC].[precision] AS ColumnPrecision
        ,[AC].[scale] AS ColumnScale
        ,[AC].[is_nullable] AS IsColumnNullable        
FROM sys.tables AS T   
INNER JOIN sys.all_columns AS AC 
	ON [T].[object_id] = [AC].[object_id]
INNER JOIN sys.types AS TY ON 
	[AC].[system_type_id] = [TY].[system_type_id] 
	AND [AC].[user_type_id] = [TY].[user_type_id]
WHERE [T].[is_ms_shipped] = 0 AND [AC].[name] = {columnname}
ORDER BY [T].[name], [AC].[column_id]","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

Name: JC Test WCC_Find_AnonFilled_By_User
Output_template:
{"systemID":"5922bf5b1c41d","systemName":"WCC SQL Dump","query":"--
-- JC 25/04/2018    Added select REPLACE(d.reference,'-Case-',''); to make
--                  sure the case reference matches the format on old forms
-- Declarations
declare
        @dbname_cursor as cursor,
        @dbname as varchar(255),
        @exec_string as varchar(1255)
;
declare
        @temptable as table( reference varchar(40), username varchar(500), dbname varchar(500), created_date varchar(25) )
;

begin

        -- Remove any previously created temporary table
        IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#wcc_temp_results') IS NOT NULL     --Remove temp table if exists
                DROP TABLE #wcc_temp_results   -- Remove temp table
    
        -- Firstly, query against old forms
 
        -- Get list of forms/processes for old forms
        set @dbname_cursor = CURSOR for
                SELECT table_name
                FROM [WCCCustomerServiceReports].information_schema.tables
                where 
                        TABLE_NAME like 'p_%' 
                        or TABLE_NAME like 'form_%'
                order by table_name
        
        -- iterate through tables
        open @dbname_cursor
        fetch next from @dbname_cursor into @dbname
        
        while @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
        begin
                set @dbname = '[WCCCustomerServiceReports].[dbo].[' + @dbname + ']'
                -- ignore tables without created_by columns
                IF COL_LENGTH(@dbname,'created_by') IS NOT NULL
                begin
                        -- add results into temp table
                        set @exec_string = '
                                select
                                        d.reference,
                                        c.display_name,
                                        ''' + @dbname + ''' as dbname,
                                        convert(varchar(25), d.created_date, 120) as created_date
                                from ' + @dbname + ' d
                                        inner join [WCCCustomerServiceReports].[dbo].[case] c
                                        on d.reference = c.case_reference
                                where 
                                        ( d.created_by = ''0'' or d.created_by = ''undefined'' )
                                        and d.created_date between ''{#DateTimeFrom}'' and ''{#DateTimeTo}''
                                        and c.username = ''{#lookup_value}''
                                '
                        insert into @temptable exec(@exec_string)
                end;
                fetch next from @dbname_cursor into @dbname
        end;
        
        -- Secondly, do similar job on New Forms process_% tables

        -- Get list of forms/processes for old forms
        set @dbname_cursor = CURSOR for
                SELECT table_name
                FROM [WCCCustomerServiceReportsNewAchieveForms].information_schema.tables
                where 
                        TABLE_NAME like 'process_%' 
                order by table_name
        
        -- iterate through tables
        open @dbname_cursor
        fetch next from @dbname_cursor into @dbname
        
        while @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
        begin
                set @dbname = '[WCCCustomerServiceReportsNewAchieveForms].[dbo].[' + @dbname + ']'
                -- ignore tables without either citizen_id or citizen_name
                IF COL_LENGTH(@dbname,'citizen_id') IS NOT NULL
                begin
                    -- Now check if the citizen_name is not null
                    IF COL_LENGTH(@dbname,'citizen_name') IS NOT NULL
                    BEGIN
                        -- add results into temp table
                        set @exec_string = '
                                select
                                        d.reference as reference,
                                        c.display_name as username,
                                        ''' + @dbname + ''' as dbname,
                                        convert(varchar(25), d.created_date, 120) as created_date
                                from ' + @dbname + ' d
                                        inner join [WCCCustomerServiceReports].[dbo].[case] c
                                        on replace(d.reference,''-Case-'','''') = c.case_reference
                                 where 
                                        ( d.citizen_id = 0 or d.citizen_name = ''Anonymous'')
                                        and d.created_date between ''{#DateTimeFrom}'' and ''{#DateTimeTo}''
                                        and c.username = ''{#lookup_value}''
                                '
                     end
                     else
                     begin
                        set @exec_string = '
                                select
                                        d.reference as reference,
                                        c.display_name as username,
                                        ''' + @dbname + ''' as dbname,
                                        convert(varchar(25), d.created_date, 120) as created_date
                                from ' + @dbname + ' d
                                        inner join [WCCCustomerServiceReports].[dbo].[case] c
                                        on replace(d.reference,''-Case-'','''') = c.case_reference
                                 where 
                                        d.citizen_id = 0
                                        and d.created_date between ''{#DateTimeFrom}'' and ''{#DateTimeTo}''
                                        and c.username = ''{#lookup_value}''
                                '
                    end;
                    
                        insert into @temptable exec(@exec_string)
                end;
                fetch next from @dbname_cursor into @dbname
        end;
   
		-- Make sure we output something
        -- output temp table contents
        select reference, username, created_date, COUNT(*) OVER () as totalRows
            from @temptable order by created_date desc
end;","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

        when 'RE' then 'Report received and will be looked at by our Highways team'
        when 'RF' then 'Report has been referred to responsible owner / organisation'
        when 'DR' then 'A report has been registered as a defect'
        when 'WI' then 'Defect has been scheduled for maintainence'
        when 'DU' then 'A reported defect is a duplicate of an existing defect'
        when 'CO' then 'Report has been resolved'
        when 'NF' then 'Report does not meet our eligibility criteria (http://www.warwickshire.gov.uk/potholes)'
        else 'Pending'
    end as DOC_REASON,
    case DOC_STATUS_CODE
        when 'RE' then 'red'
        when 'RF' then 'noright'
        when 'DR' then 'amber'
        when 'WI' then 'blue'
        when 'CO' then 'green'
when 'DU' then 'exclaim'
when 'NF' then 'black'
        else 'Pending'
    end as icon_type
from docs
where 
    DOC_COMPL_NORTH is not null -- has coords
    and ( DOC_COMPL_COMPLETE is null or DOC_COMPL_COMPLETE >= sysdate - 14 ) -- incomplete or complete within a fortnight
and DOC_COMPL_TYPE = 'PO'","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

Name: WCC_C_Live_Exeter_Visit_Update
Search WCCCustomerServiceData
Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","systemID":"55dd90215f2e0","systemName":"WCC_Dataselects","query":"-- Drop #Results table if it exists already
--IF OBJECT_ID({tempdb} + '.dbo.#Results', 'U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #Results;

-- Purpose: To search all columns of all tables for a given search string
--
-- Parameters (to be) referenced/pulled in from Firmstep form:
--
--      searchstring            String to find in selectedtable

DECLARE @SearchStr nvarchar(110)

-- Set up dummy constant search string for initial testing
SET @SearchStr = {searchstring}

-- Set up temporary #Results table
CREATE TABLE {tempdb} (ColumnName nvarchar(370), ColumnValue nvarchar(3630))

SET NOCOUNT ON
    
DECLARE @TableName nvarchar(256), @ColumnName nvarchar(128), @SearchStr2 nvarchar(110)

SET NOCOUNT ON

SET  @TableName = ''
SET @SearchStr2 = QUOTENAME('%' + @SearchStr + '%','''')

WHILE @TableName IS NOT NULL

    BEGIN
        SET @ColumnName = ''
        SET @TableName =
        (
            SELECT MIN(QUOTENAME(TABLE_SCHEMA) + '.' + QUOTENAME(TABLE_NAME))
            FROM     INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES
            WHERE         TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = 'dbo'
                AND    QUOTENAME(TABLE_SCHEMA) + '.' + QUOTENAME(TABLE_NAME) > @TableName
                AND    OBJECTPROPERTY(
                        OBJECT_ID(
                            QUOTENAME(TABLE_SCHEMA) + '.' + QUOTENAME(TABLE_NAME)
                             ), 'IsMSShipped'
                               ) = 0
        )

        WHILE (@TableName IS NOT NULL) AND (@ColumnName IS NOT NULL)

        BEGIN
            SET @ColumnName =
            (
                SELECT MIN(QUOTENAME(COLUMN_NAME))
                FROM     INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS
                WHERE         TABLE_SCHEMA    = PARSENAME(@TableName, 2)
                    AND    TABLE_NAME    = PARSENAME(@TableName, 1)
    --              AND    DATA_TYPE IN ('uniqueidentifier')
                    AND    DATA_TYPE IN ('char', 'varchar', 'nchar', 'nvarchar', 'int', 'decimal')
                    AND    QUOTENAME(COLUMN_NAME) > @ColumnName
            )

            IF @ColumnName IS NOT NULL

            BEGIN
                INSERT INTO {tempdb}
                EXEC
                (
                    'SELECT ''' + @TableName + '.' + @ColumnName + ''', LEFT(' + @ColumnName + ', 3630) FROM ' + @TableName + ' (NOLOCK) ' +
                    ' WHERE ' + @ColumnName + ' LIKE ' + @SearchStr2
                )
            END
        END
    END

    SELECT distinct ColumnName FROM {tempdb}","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

Name: TEST JC Global search
Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","systemID":"5922bf5b1c41d","systemName":"WCC SQL Dump","query":"DECLARE @searchStr nvarchar(110)
DECLARE @mydb nvarchar(100) = QUOTENAME({dataset});

SET @searchStr = {search_string}

-- Drop #Results table if it exists already
IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb.dbo.#GlobalSearchResults', 'U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #Results;

-- Set up temporary #GlobalSearchResults table
CREATE TABLE #GlobalSearchResults (TableName nvarchar(256), ColumnName nvarchar(128), ColumnValue nvarchar(3630))

SET NOCOUNT ON
    
DECLARE @TableName nvarchar(256), @ColumnName nvarchar(128), @SearchStr2 nvarchar(110)

SET NOCOUNT ON

SET  @TableName = ''
SET @SearchStr2 = QUOTENAME('%' + @SearchStr + '%','''')

WHILE @TableName IS NOT NULL

    BEGIN
        SET @ColumnName = ''
        SET @TableName =
        (
            SELECT @mydb + '.' + MIN(QUOTENAME(TABLE_SCHEMA) + '.' + QUOTENAME(TABLE_NAME))
            FROM     INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES
            WHERE         TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = 'dbo'
                AND    QUOTENAME(TABLE_SCHEMA) + '.' + QUOTENAME(TABLE_NAME) > @TableName
                AND    OBJECTPROPERTY(
                        OBJECT_ID(
                            QUOTENAME(TABLE_SCHEMA) + '.' + QUOTENAME(TABLE_NAME)
                             ), 'IsMSShipped'
                               ) = 0
        )

        WHILE (@TableName IS NOT NULL) AND (@ColumnName IS NOT NULL)

        BEGIN
            SET @ColumnName =
            (
                SELECT MIN(QUOTENAME(COLUMN_NAME))
                FROM     INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS
                WHERE         TABLE_SCHEMA    = PARSENAME(@TableName, 2)
                    AND    TABLE_NAME    = PARSENAME(@TableName, 1)
    --              AND    DATA_TYPE IN ('uniqueidentifier')
                    AND    DATA_TYPE IN ('char', 'varchar', 'nchar', 'nvarchar', 'int', 'decimal')
                    AND    QUOTENAME(COLUMN_NAME) > @ColumnName
            )

            IF @ColumnName IS NOT NULL

            BEGIN
                INSERT INTO #GlobalSearchResults
                EXEC
                (
                    'SELECT ''' + @TableName + ''',''' + @ColumnName + ''', LEFT(' + @ColumnName + ', 3630) FROM ' + @TableName + ' (NOLOCK) ' +
                    ' WHERE ' + @ColumnName + ' LIKE ' + @SearchStr2
                )
            END
        END
    END

    SELECT DISTINCT Tablename, ColumnName, ColumnValue, COUNT(*) AS Occurrences FROM #GlobalSearchResults GROUP BY Tablename, ColumnName, ColumnValue","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

Name: WCC_CopyCert_Find_Refunds_Live
Category: Copy Certificates - Births, Deaths and Marriages
Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","systemID":"55dd90215f2e0","systemName":"WCC_Dataselects","query":"/* ** Look for refunds to be done
If a query returns any rows then FS thinks it's "valid",
if it returns no rows then it's "invalid". So, if there's
no refunds then there's no results here.
*/

select oi.fs_reference,oi.fs_reference as refund_ref,oi.qty_ordered, oi.surname, oi.bmd_ref, li.was_provided, li.was_refused, oi.id as line_id,(oi.qty_ordered * {cert_price}) as line_cost_display,(oi.qty_ordered * {cert_price}) as Line_cost,
    case oi.record_type
        when 'b' then 'Birth'
        when 'm' then 'Marriage'
        when 'd' then 'Death'
        else 'Error'
    end as record_type,
    case SUBSTRING(oi.bmd_ref, 1, 3)
        when '770' then 'Rugby'
        when '773' then 'Stratford'
        when '775' then 'Warwick'
        when '767' then 'Atherstone'
        when '768' then 'Nuneaton & Bedworth'
    end as office
from [WCCCustomerServiceData].[dbo].[WCC_FS_CopyCert_Order_Log] li
        inner join [WCCCustomerServiceData].[dbo].[WCC_FS_CopyCert_Ordered_Items] oi
                on oi.id = li.order_line_id
        inner join (
                select l.order_line_id, max(l.id) maxid
                from [WCCCustomerServiceData].[dbo].[WCC_FS_CopyCert_Ordered_Items] o
                        inner join [WCCCustomerServiceData].[dbo].[WCC_FS_CopyCert_Order_Log] l
                                on l.order_line_id = o.id
                where
                        o.fs_reference = '{#read_ref}'
                        and (l.was_provided = 1 or l.was_refused = 1)
                group by l.order_line_id
        ) a
                on a.maxid = li.id
where li.was_refused = 1","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","systemID":"55dd90215f2e0","systemName":"WCC_Dataselects","query":"declare @tablename varchar(50)
declare @testtable varchar(50)
declare @teststatement varchar(200)
declare @ref_count varchar(10)


set @tablename = CASE
    WHEN '{#Environment}' = 'Test' THEN 'dbo.WCC_FS_CopyCert_Basket_Items_Test'
    ELSE 'dbo.WCC_FS_CopyCert_Basket_Items'
END


set @teststatement = 'Select ' + @ref_count + '= count(fs_reference) from '+ @tablename + ' where fs_reference = ''{#read_ref}'''


/*IF EXISTS (exec (@teststatement))*/
BEGIN
exec(@teststatement)
END

IF @ref_count > 0
BEGIN
declare @where_statement varchar(200)
set @where_statement = 'where fs_reference = '''+'{#read_ref}'+'''and bmd_ref like '''+'{#office_ref}'+'%'''



declare @sql varchar(1000)

set @sql = '
Select convert(int, id) as id,convert(int, id) as db_id, bmd_ref, year, surname, forename, reason, reason_other, qty_ordered, place_of, date_of, maternal_forename, maternal_surname, paternal_forename, paternal_surname,fs_reference as case_ref_sub, cast(qty_ordered as int) * cast({#cert_price} as int) as Line_cost,
    case record_type
        when ''b'' then ''Birth''
        when ''m'' then ''Marriage''
        when ''d'' then ''Death''
        else ''Error''
    end as record_type,
    case SUBSTRING(bmd_ref, 1, 3)
        when ''770'' then ''Rugby''
        when ''773'' then ''Stratford''
        when ''775'' then ''Warwick''
        when ''767'' then ''Atherstone''
        when ''768'' then ''Nuneaton & Bedworth''
    end as office
from  ' + @tablename + ' ' + @where_statement + 'order by id'
exec (@sql)
END
ELSE
BEGIN
Select
'Basket Empty' as office
, '0' as qty_ordered
END","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

House '+CASE WHEN House IS NULL THEN '' ELSE CAST(House AS VARCHAR(10)) END+'
Address1 '+CASE WHEN Address1 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE Address1 END +'
Address2 '+CASE WHEN Address2 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE Address2 END+'
Address3 '+CASE WHEN Address3 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE Address3 END+'
Address4 '+CASE WHEN Address4 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE Address4 END+'
Address5 '+CASE WHEN Address5 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE Address5 END+'
Postcode '+CASE WHEN Postcode IS NULL THEN '' ELSE Postcode END+'
') AS description FROM [WCCCustomerServiceData].[dbo].[ExeterData2018] WHERE Datevisited IS NULL --AND (Latitude <= 52.36166265945955 AND Latitude >= 52.33838587981384 AND Longitude >= -1.5973532932846501 AND --Longitude <= -1.5692101067154363)","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

Name: WCC_HFSMappingBounded2018
WCC_HFSChangesV2
Output_template:
{"systemID":"55dd90215f2e0","systemName":"WCC_Dataselects","query":"DECLARE @reflat FLOAT;
DECLARE @reflong FLOAT;
DECLARE @radiusofinterest FLOAT;

-- Set above parameters to Firmstep token value
SET @reflat = {postcode_to_lat_lng/LAT_TO_USE};
SET @reflong = {postcode_to_lat_lng/LNG_TO_USE};
-- Is radius of interest in miles?
SET @radiusofinterest = {searchradius};

SELECT   Latitude,         
         Longitude,
         Postcode,
         Rating,
         House,
         Address1,
         Address2,
         Address3,
         Address4,
         Address5,
    case when House IS null then ISNULL(Address1,'')+' '+ISNULL(Address2,'')+' '+ISNULL(Address3,'')+' '+ISNULL(Address4,'')
     else
     CAST(Convert(varchar (5),ISNULL(House,'')) as Varchar(5))
        +' '+ISNULL(Address1,'')+' '+ISNULL(Address2,'')+' '+ISNULL(Address3,'')+' '+ISNULL(Address4,'') end as address_to_use 
      
         
        FROM [WCCCustomerServiceData].[dbo].[ExeterData2018]
      WHERE Datevisited IS NULL
AND 
SQRT 
( POWER((Latitude - @reflat) * COS(@reflat/180) * 40000 / 360, 2) 
+ POWER((Longitude - @reflong) * 40000 / 360, 2)) < @radiusofinterest
ORDER BY Postcode ASC","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

Output_template:
{"systemID":"55dd90215f2e0","systemName":"WCC_Dataselects","query":"-- INSERT BASKET DATA
declare @tablename varchar(50)
declare @insert_statement varchar(2000)
set @tablename = CASE
    WHEN '{#Environment}' = 'Test' THEN 'dbo.WCC_FS_CopyCert_Basket_Items_Test'
    ELSE 'dbo.WCC_FS_CopyCert_Basket_Items'
END
set @insert_statement = '(
    fs_reference, 
    bmd_ref, 
    year, 
    surname, 
    forename, 
    record_type, 
    reason, 
    reason_other, 
    place_of, 
    date_of, 
    quarter_of, 
    purpose, 
    maternal_forename, 
    maternal_surname, 
    paternal_forename, 
    paternal_surname,
    additional_information,
    age_at_death,
    any_other_names_used,
    date_of_birth,
    home_address,
    d_spouse_forename,
    d_spouse_surname,
    occupation,
    m_spouse_forename,
    m_spouse_surname,
    m_spouse_surname_other,
    qty_ordered
) values (
    ''{#case_ref}'', 
    ''{#cert_ref}'',
    ''{#cert_year}'',
    ''{#cert_surname}'',
    ''{#cert_firstname}'',
    ''{#Type_of_certificate}'',
    ''{#Relationship}'',
    ''{#Relationship_other}'',
    ''{#Place_of_Birth_Marriage_Death}'',
    ''{#Date_of_Birth_Marriage_Death}'',
    ''{#Quarter_of_Birth_Marriage_Death}'',
    ''{#cert_purpose}'',
    ''{#maternal_forename}'',
    ''{#maternal_surname}'',
    ''{#paternal_forename}'',
    ''{#paternal_surname}'',
    ''{#additional_information}'',
    ''{#age_at_death}'',
    ''{#any_other_names_used}'',
    ''{#date_of_birth}'',
    ''{#home_address}'',
    ''{#d_spouse_forename}'',
    ''{#d_spouse_surname}'',
    ''{#occupation}'',
    ''{#m_spouse_forename}'',
    ''{#m_spouse_surname}'',
    ''{#m_spouse_surname_other}'',
    1
)'

declare @sql varchar(2000)

set @sql = 'insert into ' + @tablename + ' ' + @insert_statement

exec (@sql)
;

-- RETURN RANDOM VAL TO MAKE A FIELD CHANGE
select
    RAND() as write_valid,
    '' as Place_of_Birth_Marriage_Death,
    '' as Place_not_known,
    '' as Date_of_Birth_Marriage_Death,
    '' as Date_not_known_,
    '' as Quarter_of_Birth_Marriage_Death,
    '' as paternal_forename,
    '' as Father_s_forename_s__not_known,
    '' as paternal_surname,
    '' as Father_s_surname_not_known_,
    '' as maternal_forename,
    '' as Mother_s_forename_s__not_known_,
    '' as maternal_surname,
    '' as Mother_s_surname_not_known_,
    '' as Relationship,
    '' as Relationship_other,
    '' as cert_purpose1,
    '' as cert_purpose2,
    '' as cert_ref,
    '' as additional_information,
    '' as age_at_death,
    '' as any_other_names_used,
    '' as date_of_birth,
    '' as home_address,
    '' as d_spouse_forename,
    '' as Spouse_forename_s__not_known_,
    '' as d_spouse_surname,
    '' as Spouse_surname_not_known_,
    '' as occupation,
    '' as m_spouse_forename,
    '' as m_spouse_surname,
    '' as m_spouse_surname_other,
    '' as cert_type,
    '' as cert_surname,
    '' as cert_firstname,
    '' as cert_year,
    '' as cert_registers_at,
    '' as dob_day,
    '' as dob_month,
    '' as dob_year
;

declare @tablename2 varchar(50)
declare @where_statement2 varchar(200)

set @tablename2 = CASE
    WHEN '{#Environment}' = 'Test' THEN 'dbo.WCC_FS_CopyCert_Basket_Items_Test'
    ELSE 'dbo.WCC_FS_CopyCert_Basket_Items'
END
set @where_statement2 = 'where fs_reference = '''+'{#read_ref}'+'''and bmd_ref like '''+'{#office_ref}'+'%'''

set @sql = '
Select convert(int, id) as current_basket/id,convert(int, id) as current_basket/db_id, bmd_ref as current_basket/bmd_ref, year as current_basket/year, surname as current_basket/surname, forename as current_basket/forename, reason as current_basket/reason, reason_other as current_basket/reason/other, qty_ordered as current_basket/qty_ordered, place_of as current_basket/place_of, date_of as current_basket/date_of, maternal_forename as current_basket/maternal_forename, maternal_surname as current_basket/maternal_surname, paternal_forename as current_basket/paternal_forename, paternal_surname as current_basket/paternal_surname,fs_reference as current_basket/case_ref_sub, cast(qty_ordered as int) * cast({#cert_price} as int) as current_basket/Line_cost,
    case record_type
        when ''b'' then ''Birth''
        when ''m'' then ''Marriage''
        when ''d'' then ''Death''
        else ''Error''
    end as current_basket/record_type,
    case SUBSTRING(bmd_ref, 1, 3)
        when ''770'' then ''Rugby''
        when ''773'' then ''Stratford''
        when ''775'' then ''Warwick''
        when ''767'' then ''Atherstone''
        when ''768'' then ''Nuneaton & Bedworth''
    end as current_basket/office
from  ' + @tablename2 + ' ' + @where_statement2 + 'order by id'

exec (@sql)
;","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

{consent_attemptReferrer} = '1' then coalesce({consent_show_contactref_notes},'')  +char(10)+char(13) +CONVERT(varchar(17), getdate(),113)
+' Attempt 1/3 ('+{ASC_Mosaic_UserDetails/LoggedBy}+'): '+{ASC_Mosaic_NoContact_Consent2/Referrer_no_contact_notes}+char(10)+char(13)

when
{consent_attemptReferrer} = '2' then coalesce({consent_show_contactref_notes},'')  +char(10)+char(13) +CONVERT(varchar(17), getdate(),113)
+' Attempt 2/3 ('+{ASC_Mosaic_UserDetails/LoggedBy}+'): '+{ASC_Mosaic_NoContact_Consent2/Referrer_no_contact_notes}+char(10)+char(13)

when
{consent_attemptReferrer} = '3' then coalesce({consent_show_contactref_notes},'')  +char(10)+char(13) +CONVERT(varchar(17), getdate(),113)
+' Attempt 3/3 ('+{ASC_Mosaic_UserDetails/LoggedBy}+'): '+{ASC_Mosaic_NoContact_Consent2/Referrer_no_contact_notes}+char(10)+char(13)

else {consent_show_contactref_notes}

end as consent_show_contactref_notes,





case

{consent_attemptReferrer} < '3' then 
{consent_attemptReferrer} + 1
