Name: WCC_CT_LSO_Options_v4
Output_template:
{"systemID":"556f28cda4af7","systemName":"DTF","query":"select name, name as display from
(
select
case when ({calc_existingPassFound} = 0 and {calc_inWarks} = 1) or ({calc_existingPassFound} = 1 and {calc_inWarks} = 1 and {PassStatus_search} = 'Lapsed') then 'New application'
else 'None'
end as name, 1 as SortOrder
union
select
case when ({calc_existingPassFound} = 1 and {PassStatus_search} != 'Lapsed')  then 'Cancel - moved out of area'
else 'None'
end as name, 3 as SortOrder
union
select
case when {calc_existingPassFound} = 1 and {calc_inWarks} = 0 and {PassStatus_search} != 'Lapsed' then 'Cancel - pass holder deceased'
else 'None'
end as name, 2 as SortOrder
union
select
case when {calc_existingPassFound} = 1 and {calc_inWarks} = 1 and ({calc_passType}='Age'  or {calc_passPerm}<>0) and {calc_passExp} < 33 and {PassStatus_search} != 'Lapsed' then 'Renew pass'
else 'None'
end as name, 1 as SortOrder
union
select
case when {calc_existingPassFound} = 1 and {calc_inWarks} = 1 and {calc_passExp} > 32 and ({calc_passType}='Age'  or {calc_passPerm}<>0) and  {PassStatus_search} != 'Lapsed' then 'Replace pass'
else 'None'
end as name, 1 as SortOrder
union
select
case when {calc_existingPassFound} = 1 and {calc_inWarks} = 1 and {calc_passExp} > 32 and ({calc_passType}<>'Age'  and {calc_passPerm}=0) and {PassStatus_search} != 'Lapsed' then 'Replace pass'
else 'None'
end as name, 1 as SortOrder
union
select
case when {calc_existingPassFound} = 1 and {calc_inWarks} = 1 and {PassStatus_search} != 'Lapsed' then 'Change pass details'
else 'None'
end as name, 2 as SortOrder
union
select
case when {calc_existingPassFound} = 1 and {calc_inWarks} = 1 and {PassStatus_search} != 'Lapsed' then 'Cancel - pass no longer required'
else 'None'
end as name, 3 as SortOrder
union
select
case when {calc_existingPassFound} = 1 and {calc_inWarks} = 1 and {PassStatus_search} != 'Lapsed' then 'Cancel - pass holder deceased'
else 'None'
end as name, 4 as SortOrder
union
select
case when {calc_existingPassFound} = 1 and {calc_inWarks} = 1 and {calc_passPerm}=0 and {calc_passType}<>'Age' and {calc_passExp} < 33 and {PassStatus_search} != 'Lapsed' then 'Renew temporary disabled person''s pass (requires new evidence)'
else 'None'
end as name, 0 as SortOrder
union
select
'No further action' as name, 20 as SortOrder
)x
where name <> 'None' and name <> 'No further action'
order by SortOrder","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

Name: WCC_CT_LSO_Options_v5
Output_template:
{"systemID":"556f28cda4af7","systemName":"DTF","query":"select name, name as display from
(
select
case when {calcCanStartNewApplication} = 'Yes' then 'New application'
else 'None'
end as name, 1 as SortOrder
union
select
case when {calcCanCancelMovedOutOfArea} = 'Yes' then 'Cancel - moved out of area'
else 'None'
end as name, 3 as SortOrder
union
select
case when {calcCanCancelPassholderDeceased} = 'Yes' then 'Cancel - pass holder deceased'
else 'None'
end as name, 4 as SortOrder
union
select
case when {calcCanRenewPass} = 'Yes' then 'Renew pass'
else 'None'
end as name, 1 as SortOrder
union
select
case when {calcCanReplacePass} = 'Yes' then 'Replace pass'
else 'None'
end as name, 1 as SortOrder
union
select
case when {calcUpdateDetails} = 'Yes' then 'Change pass details'
else 'None'
end as name, 2 as SortOrder
union
select
case when {calcCanCancelNoLongerRequired} = 'Yes' then 'Cancel - pass no longer required'
else 'None'
end as name, 3 as SortOrder
union
select
case when {calcCanRenewTempDPP} = 'Yes' then 'Renew temporary disabled person''s pass (requires new evidence)'
else 'None'
end as name, 0 as SortOrder
union
select
'No further action' as name, 20 as SortOrder
)x
where name <> 'None' and name <> 'No further action'
order by SortOrder","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

Name: WCC Search for UCRN
Output_template:
{"systemID":"55c0a782f3b4e","systemName":"Old forms Data Dump","query":"DECLARE @surname VARCHAR(MAX)
DECLARE @modified_email VARCHAR(MAX)
DECLARE @modified_surname VARCHAR(MAX)

SET @surname = 'Thornton'
SET @modified_email = ''
SET @modified_surname = UPPER(LEFT(@surname,1))+LOWER(SUBSTRING(@surname,2,LEN(@surname)))

IF @modified_email != ''
  SELECT UCRN as customer_ucrn, Status, First_Name, Surname, Date_of_Birth, Email_Address FROM [WCCCustomerServiceReports].[dbo].[individual] 
WHERE [Email_Address]= @modified_email 
UNION
SELECT 'No Match Found', '', '', '', '', '' FROM [WCCCustomerServiceReports].[dbo].[individual] 
ELSE 
SELECT UCRN as customer_ucrn, Status, First_Name, Surname, Date_of_Birth, Email_Address FROM [WCCCustomerServiceReports].[dbo].[individual] 
WHERE [Surname] = @modified_surname
UNION
SELECT 'No Match Found', '', '', '', '', '' FROM [WCCCustomerServiceReports].[dbo].[individual]","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

Name: Fitter Futures general enquiry - look up (status of referral)
LLPG Postcode lookup for address form 1/2
Output_template:
{"systemID":"556f28cda4af7","systemName":"DTF","query":"select CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',locality_name,', ',town_name) as display, uprn as name,
sao as flat, pao as house,street_name as street,town_name as town, post_town, county_name as county,postcode,uprn,lng,lat, locality_name as locality,ward,usrn
FROM warwickshire_dtf.llpgcache
WHERE 
((uprn ={uprn}) and ({postcode_search}='')) or ((
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE('{#postcode_search}',' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like '%{#postcode_search}%')
)
AND length(REPLACE('{#postcode_search}',' ',''))>5
) 

UNION 
select CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',locality_name,', ',town_name) as display, uprn as name,sao as flat,pao as house,street_name as street,town_name as town, post_town, county_name as county,postcode,uprn,lng,lat, locality_name as locality,ward,usrn
FROM northwarks_dtf.llpgcache

WHERE 
((uprn ={uprn}) and ({postcode_search}='')) or ((
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE('{#postcode_search}',' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like '%{#postcode_search}%')
)
AND length(REPLACE('{#postcode_search}',' ',''))>5
) 

UNION
select CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',locality_name,', ',town_name) as display, uprn as name,
sao as flat,pao as house,street_name as street,town_name as town, post_town,  county_name as county,postcode,uprn,lng,lat, locality_name as locality,ward,usrn
FROM nbbc_dtf.llpgcache

WHERE 
((uprn ={uprn}) and ({postcode_search}='')) or ((
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE('{#postcode_search}',' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like '%{#postcode_search}%')
)
AND length(REPLACE('{#postcode_search}',' ',''))>5
) 

UNION
select CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',locality_name,', ',town_name) as display, uprn as name,
sao as flat,pao as house,street_name as street,town_name as town, post_town, county_name as county,postcode,uprn,lng,lat, locality_name as locality,ward,usrn
FROM rbc_dtf.llpgcache

WHERE 
((uprn ={uprn}) and ({postcode_search}='')) or ((
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE('{#postcode_search}',' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like '%{#postcode_search}%')
)
AND length(REPLACE('{#postcode_search}',' ',''))>5
) 
UNION
select CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',locality_name,', ',town_name) as display, uprn as name,
sao as flat,pao as house,street_name as street,town_name as town, post_town, county_name as county,postcode,uprn,lng,lat, locality_name as locality,ward,usrn
FROM sdc_dtf.llpgcache

WHERE 
((uprn ={uprn}) and ({postcode_search}='')) or ((
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE('{#postcode_search}',' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like '%{#postcode_search}%')
)
AND length(REPLACE('{#postcode_search}',' ',''))>5
) 
ORDER BY street, house*1, house, flat ASC
LIMIT 750","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

Name: Firmstep Solutions Lookup UPRN
Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","systemID":"59a682ef9a716","results_page_columns_db":"","query":"-- Firmstep Solutions Lookup UPRN v1.0 
SELECT `sao` AS 'flat',
	`pao` AS 'house',
	`street_name` AS 'street',
	`town_name` AS 'town',
	`county_name` AS 'county',
	`postcode`,
	`uprn`,
	`ward`,
	`lng`,
	`lat`,
	`locality_name` AS 'locality',
	`usrn`,
	REPLACE(REPLACE(LTRIM(CONCAT(`sao`,' ',`pao`,' ' ,`street_name`,', ',`locality_name`,', ',`town_name`,' ',`postcode`,', ',`county_name`)),', ,',','),' ',' ') AS 'addresslabel'
FROM llpgcache
WHERE `uprn` = {Choose_Address} 
	AND {Choose_Address} <> ''
LIMIT 1","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes","new_category":"MyServices","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read"}

Name: Firmstep Solutions Lookup Service
Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","systemID":"59a682ef9a716","results_page_columns_db":"","query":"-- Firmstep Solutions Lookup Service v1.2
SELECT DISTINCT 
	`UPRN` AS 'uprn',
	`POSTCODE` AS 'postcode',
	CASE `SAO` WHEN '' THEN `SAO` ELSE (CASE `PAO` WHEN '' THEN 'null' ELSE `SAO` END) END AS 'flat',
	CASE `PAO` WHEN '' THEN (CASE `SAO` WHEN '' THEN 'null' ELSE `SAO` END) ELSE `PAO` END AS 'house',
	`STREET_NAME` AS 'street',
	`TOWN_NAME` AS 'town',
	`POST_TOWN` AS 'post_town',
	`COUNTY_NAME` AS 'county',
	`LOCALITY_NAME` AS 'locality',
	`WARD` AS 'ward',
	`LNG` AS 'lng',
	`LAT` AS 'lat'
FROM llpgcache
WHERE (
  ((LENGTH(REPLACE('{#Postcode}', ' ','')) > 3 OR LENGTH(REPLACE('{#Street}', ' ','')) > 3 OR LENGTH(REPLACE('{#Number}', ' ','')) > 0)
  OR (LENGTH('{#Postcode}') = 0 AND LENGTH('{#Street}') = 0 AND LENGTH('{#Number}') = 0))
  AND (TRIM('{#Postcode}') = '' OR REPLACE(`POSTCODE`, ' ','') LIKE CONCAT('%', REPLACE(REPLACE('{#Postcode}',' ',''), '%',''), '%'))
  AND (TRIM('{#Street}') = '' OR TRIM(`STREET_NAME`) LIKE CONCAT('%', REPLACE(TRIM('{#Street}'), '%', ''), '%'))
  AND (TRIM('{#Number}') = '' OR TRIM(`PAO`) LIKE CONCAT('%', REPLACE(TRIM('{#Number}'), '%', ''), '%'))
)
ORDER BY `STREET_NAME` DESC, (`PAO` * 1) DESC, `PAO` DESC, `SAO` ASC
LIMIT 256","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes","new_category":"MyServices","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read"}

Name: Firmstep Solutions Lookup Postcode
Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","systemID":"59a682ef9a716","results_page_columns_db":"","query":"-- Firmstep Solutions Lookup Postcode v1.0
SELECT REPLACE(CONCAT(TRIM(CONCAT(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',town_name,',  ',postcode), 'Street Record', '') AS 'display',
	uprn AS 'name',
	CONCAT(sao,' ',pao) AS 'flatHouse',
	sao AS 'flat',
	pao AS 'house',
	street_name AS 'street',
	town_name AS 'town',
	county_name AS 'county',
	postcode,
	uprn, 
	ward, 
	lng, 
	lat, 
	locality_name AS 'locality', 
	usrn
FROM llpgcache
WHERE ((REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE('{#postcode_search}',' ','')) OR (CONCAT(TRIM(CONCAT(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) LIKE '%{#postcode_search}%'))
	AND length(REPLACE('{#postcode_search}',' ','')) > 2
ORDER BY CAST(SUBSTRING(house,LOCATE(' ',house)+1) AS SIGNED) ASC 
LIMIT 1000;","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes","new_category":"MyServices","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read"}
